text:
The karaoke place at Plaza Singapura is a nice spot for parties. There are plenty of rooms, each with stylish futuristic decor and a good sound system. However, the lighting is a bit strange ‚Äî after each song, it switches to a darker mode, while we actually preferred it to stay bright.
They have a large selection of songs, and the food is decent, though it‚Äôs served quite slowly. The air conditioning is extremely cold, making both me and the food freeze, and there‚Äôs no way to adjust it. Overall, it‚Äôs an okay experience, but you‚Äôll definitely need to dress warmly, almost like you‚Äôre going into winter.

The location was central and so convenient. The room catered to a large group, and we all came at different times, but were able to find our room easily.

So much song and laughter. It was only my second time going to karaoke (the first being in Suzhou, China, in 2017). This experience was very comparable. Their facilities were top notch. Their song choice was wide enough. I don‚Äôt know any Chinese songs, nor  do I know much about pop, so their selection of 90s alternative music made me super happy.

All-in-all a great night. Not bad for someone who does not like hanging out with people in large groups (at least for now).

They hv props for u to play with.. very decent and family karaoke style. The receptionist not friendly and had bad face. The service staff are more approachable and friendly to guide u on the system and direction.  I didn‚Äôt order the foods. As we took our lunch bef gg to karaoke place. I wld recommend to provide one free drinks for customers

I had an unforgettable party event at K.Star, thanks to Raymond and his wonderful team! From the moment we arrived, everything was seamless and our room perfectly set up for the event.

Raymond always went above and beyond to ensure we had an amazing experience, even making special arrangements for the vegetarians in our group. I can‚Äôt recommend Raymond and his team enough‚Äîthey truly made our night special!

Went on a sunday and called beforehand to book a room. The person we talked to on the phone was nice and fast to process our request and helped us sort out all the details. The room we were given was clean and fun, it had a lot of features we could play with and a good sound system.

The staff there were all smiles and very nice. Would definitely recommend if you want to have a good time with your group of friends üëçüèª
